options.name: Hellish Larynx
options.description: The model part gains Breath Attack(Str 3, AP 2, Magical Attacks, Stand and Shoot).

options.name: Trampling Hooves
options.description: Model parts without Mount or Construct gain Grind Attack(D3, Str 5 AP 2, Magical Attacks, Unmodifiable).

options.name: Horrifying Visage
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Until the end of the Phase.
May be activated at the start of a friendly Charge Phase. When activated, the model gains Horror and its Charge Range rolls gain Maximised.

options.name: Mirrored Scales
options.description: Each Melee Attack allocated towards the model for which a natural ‘1’ to hit is rolled, hits the attacking model's Health Pool instead.

options.name: Kaleidoscopic Flesh
options.description: Hard Target(1).

options.name: Guiding Kaleidoscopic Flesh
options.description: The model and each R&F model in its unit gains Hard Target (1).

options.name: Mark of the Eternal Champion
options.description: The unit or model knows (or gains) Spear of Infinity (Hereditary Spell) as an additional spell. In addition, if the unit or model is not a Wizard, it gains Wizard Conclave(1) .

options.name: Hammer Hand
options.description: +1 Att.

options.name: Unnatural Roots
options.description: A unit containing one or more Manifestations of Unnatural Roots gains Resolute(1).

options.name: Brimstone Secretions
options.description: Immune(Divine Attacks).

options.name: Centipede Legs
options.description: +2" Mob.

options.name: Chitinous Scales
options.description: +2 Arm, to a maximum of 3.

options.name: Dark Hide
options.description: At the start of step 3.5 of Battle Setup, Move Vanguard Units, you may remove units entirely with this Manifestation from the Battlefield and deploy them again elsewhere, following their normal deployment restrictions.

options.name: Hell Can Wait
options.description:
One use only. Duration: Until the end of the Phase.
May be activated just before the model's unit rolls a Break Test. The Break Test is automatically failed, and the HP loss suffered from Supernal is halved, rounding fractions down.

options.name: Piercing Spike
options.description: +1 AP.

options.name: Charged Tendrils
options.description: Lightning Attacks.

options.name: Venom Sacs
options.description: Poison Attacks (Melee & Shooting).

options.name: Digestive Vomit
options.description: Duration: Permanent. If the model has previously been on the winning side of a Combat while having this Manifestation, it gains +1 Str and +1 AP.

options.name: Unholy Appetite
options.description: After a Round of Combat in which at least one Attack with this Manifestation caused an unsaved wound, all Attacks from models in the unit entirely with this Manifestation gain Hatred until the end of the next Player Turn.

options.name: Unhinging Jaw
options.description: Zeal(towards Height 3--5).

options.name: Segmented Shell
options.description: When the model suffers a wound from an Attack with Multiple Wounds(X), reduce X by 1, to a minimum of 1.

options.name: Clinging Ichor
options.description: Enemy units in base contact with the bearer lose Devastating Charge(if they had it).

options.name: Smothering Coils
options.description: Zeal(towards Scoring).

options.name: Mesmerising Plumage
options.description: Afflict(1 Def, 1 Off).

options.name: Hidden Knives
options.description: Melee Attacks allocated by the model towards an enemy unit's Flank or Rear Facing gain +1 Str and +1 AP.

options.name: Hot Blood
options.description: Devastating Charge(+2 Agi).

options.name: Torporous Tendrils
options.description: Afflict(-2 Agi).

options.name: Sorcerous Antennae
options.description: During Siphon the Veil step of your Magic Phase, add one additional Magic Dice to your pool for each unit containing this Manifestation.

options.name: All-Seeing Eye
options.description: Accurate.

options.name: Whipcrack Tail
options.description: Melee Attacks gain +1 to hit.

options.name: Curved Tusks
options.description: The model parts Melee Attacks gain +1 Str and +1 AP. For each Melee Attack for which a natural ‘1’ is rolled to wound, this model suffers a hit that wounds automatically, with AP 10.

options.name: Incendiary Ichor
options.description: Aegis(3+, against Flaming Attacks) and Flaming Attacks(Melee & Shooting). The model automatically fails all Regeneration Saves.

options.name: Bronze Backbone
options.description: First Strike(Hatred).

options.name: Golden Helm
options.description: Discipline Tests taken by the unit gain Minimised.

options.name: Horns of Hubris
options.description: Vanguard(3").

options.name: Impact Hits (2 hits) and Devastating Charge (+1 Str, +1 AP)
